message: Is it possible to cycle classes within Middleman (HAML)? I tried using "%li{:class=>(cycle 'odd', 'even')}" and "%li{:class=>cycle ('odd', 'even')}" with no luck. Thanks.
The cycle helper is a part of Rails, so it's not available in MM, but you could add it using the helpers block of your config. See here: http://openmonkey.com/2009/02/13/a-cycle-helper-for-sinatra/
